com.orbischallenge.logging

Class Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orbischallenge.logging.Log

  • public class Log
extends java.lang.Object
    Extremely simple class for simple logging helpers. Key function is printing method name as a prefix when using logOutDebug. Created by Orbis Access (Canada) Ltd. on 14 July 2016.

    • Method Summary

      • logErrDebug

        public static void logErrDebug(java.lang.String message,
               java.lang.Throwable ex)
        Logs a message to the all err targets, as well as the stack trace for the given Throwable. Prefixes the messages with the method that called it.
        Parameters:
        message -
        ex -
